name: com.indiegabo.ldtk-level-manager
description: A solution for managing LDtk levels in Unity.

scripts.pre-release: npx auto-changelog -p && mv -f CHANGELOG.md ../../docfx_project/documentation/CHANGELOG.md && docfx ../../docfx_project/docfx.json && echo Go create Unity .meta and the .unitypackage before releasing

samples.description: [Hard Dependency on Cimnemachine 2.9.7] A simple example of how to use LDtk Level Manager. Open the Scenes/Universe scene and hit play.
